member.name: M:SvgSplitLibrary.SvgSplit.CreateSupportLayers(System.String,System.String,System.Double)
member.param: The source directory.
The output directory.
The wall thickness in pixels.

member.name: M:SvgSplitLibrary.SvgSplit.CreateDlpLayers(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Single,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates DLP layers from layers generated by MakeLayers.
member.param: Source directory with layers created with MakeLayers. Only TIFF images will be processed.
Output directory where DLP layers will be generated. WARNING: if the directory is not empty, all files will be deleted!
Maximum brightness directly at the object walls (255=white, 0=black).
Minimum brightness inside thick solid objects (255=white, 0=black).
Drop in brightness per distance unit (pixel).
Layers to be generated. Can be range and/or numbers separated by comma (i.e. 2-3, 5, 7-8). "all" or "" will process all layers.
member.returns: True on success, false on error.

member.name: M:SvgSplitLibrary.SvgSplit.CreateDlpLayers(System.String,System.String,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates DLP layers from layers generated by MakeLayers.
member.param: Source directory with layers created with MakeLayers. Only TIFF images will be processed.
Output directory where DLP layers will be generated. WARNING: if the directory is not empty, all files will be deleted!
Maximum brightness directly at the object walls (100=white, 0=black).
Minimum brightness inside thick solid objects (100=white, 0=black).
Width in millimeters between linear gradients running from maximum to minimum brightness.
Dots per inch to convert from millimeters to pixels.
Layers to be generated. Can be range and/or numbers separated by comma (i.e. 2-3, 5, 7-8). "all" or "" will process all layers.
member.returns: True on success, false on error.

member.name: M:SvgSplitLibrary.SvgSplit.CreateLayerOverlay(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.param: The source directory.
The output directory.
The overlay source.
if set to true [invert].
if set to true [apply on black].
Layers to be generated. Can be range and/or numbers separated by comma (i.e. 2-3, 5, 7-8). "all" or "" will process all layers.
